body_html:
@DenisN03 the version you use also uses max_pool_with_argmax as Kwotsin's.
@liangxiao05 , @saeed68gm , we are trying the following approach:

  • replace max_pool_with_argmax by simple max_pool, without getting the indices
  • unpool with resize_nearest_neighbor or resize_bilinear
    The first tests show no apparent loss on our application (binary segmentation), dont know yet regarding the inference time on CPU.

If this workaround finally does not suit our needs, we'll probably just switch to Caffe2...
